# Define an ImGUI target that uses the WebGPU backends

include_directories(../webgpu/include/webgpu)
include_directories(../webgpu/include)
add_library(
  imgui STATIC
  backends/imgui_impl_wgpu.h
  backends/imgui_impl_wgpu.cpp
  backends/imgui_impl_glfw.h
  backends/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
  misc/cpp/imgui_stdlib.h
  misc/cpp/imgui_stdlib.cpp
  imconfig.h
  imgui.h
  imgui.cpp
  imgui_draw.cpp
  imgui_internal.h
  imgui_tables.cpp
  imgui_widgets.cpp
  imstb_rectpack.h
  imstb_textedit.h
  imstb_truetype.h)

# This is used to advertise the flavor of WebGPU that this zip provides
target_compile_definitions(imgui INTERFACE WEBGPU_BACKEND_WGPU)
target_include_directories(imgui PUBLIC .)
target_link_libraries(imgui PUBLIC webgpu glfw)
